reviewText: Hours of crying and love. I love it even though my boyfriend hates it, but he has no say in it. :)

There is not a book writen by Nicholas Sparks that I have not enjoy.  The movies inspired by him are a great transalation of the feeling that he delivers in his writings.  I love the actor and actress selected for the movies and the slight little twist that differ from the books as well.  This package was very thought off.  I love the author's note and the movie quotes postcards.  That added a great touch to the collection.  I send all post cards to a frame shop to be able to exhibit and rememeber those lovely quotes.  Thanks Nicholas!  Keep on writing and I'll keep on reading.
This limited edition collection offers a great value for what it's worth. Each DVD offers great extras that one can really enjoy from the movies.
I per-order this amazing collection for my wife for Valentine's Day! And I got it before time and fully carefully packed to me...

give this to a friend, girlfriend, a cashier at the local store, to a hooker, to a waitress, to your secretary, to a girl your are attracted to, to your schoolmate, to your wife which keeps ignoring you for the last 30 years, to any random girl on the street......... SEX GUARANTEED FOR 110%! ;-D
Nice assortment  of his movies.
Great
Great box set and priced very reasonably.  Arrived timely.
I have all the books so this collection is great. However I don't like how it doesn't have the last song in it.
love Nicholas Sparks

Everything was fine until I opened the box and the thing keeping the DVDs together was broken. I think the mail people might of been too rough with it during the process of it getting here. Other than everything was fine.
love it and great service
It doesn't work on my laptop or on my sister her laptop. It also doesn't work on my tv.
I love Nicholas Sparks books and his movies warms my heart. Excellent collection.
Just wonderful everything i wanted!!
Great movies.
I got this as a gift for a friend and she loved it. Shipping was really fast and price was good.
Love his movies and getting this package was a great way to collect my favorites.
I loved having all these great movies come in one box. Makes a perfect gift for that person who loves romantic movies. I am a big fan of Nicholas Sparks
Great product, fast shipping!
Absolutely AMAZING!!!!!!
I love this, all of the love stories in one. I have one complaint and that is on Night In Rodanthe the picture went a little off center but all in all I would recommend this collection.
Love all these movies! Great Buy

I bought this for the girlfriend. She loves all these movies and even had a couple already. This was a great present and won me some big "brownie points"

Oh, and the item came in great condition and very quick
my daughter got this for her father for Father's Day, now they can watch all the love stories together, very pleased with delivery and product.
Arrived promptly and well packaged!  I love Nicholas Sparks and my two favorite movies of all time are in this collection!  Very happy with this purchase.
Their is nothing to complain about this collection.  All of his books and movies are great.  Can watch over and over.
When it arrived, package was damaged. Aswell as the zone being in an American zone makes a pest for watching on an Australian DVD player
I love Carolina Beaches.  Been There love it.  My ex wife loved these movies and they grown on me too.  Maybe my Allie will come back too.  Haaaa Haaaaa!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I absolutely love Nicholas Sparks books, and now to have the movies is Heaven on Earth!!

Thank you for offering this priceless Limited Edition Collection.

I was surprise how long the delay for getting it. It's not the first time I buy from any Amazon and the past 6 months, I found that the delay takes much longer time, even though I may have paid for faster receipt.
good movies lots of fun for a girls movie night sparks is the best ever loved the set !!! <3
What can I say, it's Nicholas Sparks!  Nothing more to be said, he is my favorite author of all time.
I love movies based on Nicholas Sparks books. When I received notice of this opportunity, I jumped at the chance. Some of my favorite movies in one box that I can watch over and over again!

I have read all his books and love all his movies.  This was the best birthday present.  I was sick and in bed for almost a week and I got to sit there and watch all these movies.  Some I haven't seen in years. I totally recommend this collection and the price was great.
How exciting to have many of my favorites in one location.  I have read all the books and seen many of the movies so I appreciate adding to my collection.  Thank you for doing this for fans!
Being a Carolina girl, I have loved all of his books and movies.....collected them all.....wondering why anyone who has ever lived in Carolina would ever leave....

No more to say......awesome.....excellent exceeded expectations.....love the man.....love his movies......would buy more box sets in the future....Nicholas Sparks rocks....yesssss.....thanks a million

I was only disappointed that 'The Last Song' was not part of it.  But will enjoy the other 7.
Thank you
Nicholas Sparks movies are my favorite, so having all of these in one collection os awesome! Of course, I would have liked  to see "The Last Song" in here as well, but I'll take what I can get!
Worth every penny. It was the best price i found and was delivered 3 days later. My wife loves the books so this made a great birthday gift for her.

What is there not to like about Nicholas Sparks.  Whether it is the movies from his books or the books themself.  You just can't beat his writings.  This collection is just more proof of the fact that he is awesome.
I have always been a Nicholas Sparks fan! I already had all of the movies accept 2! So I just bought it! I am glad I did!

While it may cost less to buy each individual movie based on a Nicholas Sparks book, this set puts them all nicely together if you're low on shelf space or looking for a gift. Plus it's a limited edition!
My wife loved these movies and I was glad they were available in a bundle. Excellent deal. Happy wife happy life.
Great Movie!
Nicholas Sparks ... Nothing more to say!
Perfect for a rainy day!
Love Nicholas Sparks! I also love that i have his collection all in once place. I keep this bad boy safely tucked away in my book shelf and away from my kids dirty hands and safe from tearing.
Great buy!!!
Glad to get it.  Enjoyed all of them.
So easy to watch the whole series since it's all together in one place! Will defiantly be buying the next box set
Great collection but you can buy them separately at a lower price
If you're a Sparks fan what's not to like
Purchased as a gift.  Recipient loves anything by Nicholas Sparks.
